org.youscope.addon.skin

Class SkinFactoryAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.youscope.addon.skin.SkinFactoryAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SkinFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DarkSkinFactory, SystemSkinFactory

    public class SkinFactoryAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SkinFactory
    Adapter simplifying skin addon creation.
    Author:
    Moritz Lang

    • Constructor Detail

      • SkinFactoryAdapter

        public SkinFactoryAdapter(java.lang.Class<? extends Skin> addonClass,
                          AddonMetadata metadata)
        Constructor. When invoked, the factory exposes the given look-and-feel addon.
        Parameters:
        addonClass - The class of the look and feel exposed to the user.
        metadata - Metadata about this look-and-feel.

      • SkinFactoryAdapter

        public SkinFactoryAdapter()
        Constructor. Factory does no (yet) expose any addon. Use addAddon(java.lang.Class<? extends org.youscope.addon.skin.Skin>, org.youscope.addon.AddonMetadata) to expose addons.

    • Method Detail

      • addAddon

        public void addAddon(java.lang.Class<? extends Skin> addonClass,
                     AddonMetadata metadata)
        Adds an addon. When invoked, the factory exposes the given look-and-feel addon.
        Parameters:
        addonClass - The class of the look-and-feel exposed to the user.
        metadata - Metadata about this look-and-feel.

      • getSupportedTypeIdentifiers

        public java.lang.String[] getSupportedTypeIdentifiers()
        Description copied from interface: SkinFactory
        Returns a list of all skin type identifiers supported by this factory. A type identifier is a string unique for a given look and feel type, with which the skin type is identified.
        Specified by:
        getSupportedTypeIdentifiers in interface SkinFactory
        Returns:
        List of supported skin types.

      • isSupportingTypeIdentifier

        public boolean isSupportingTypeIdentifier(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
        Description copied from interface: SkinFactory
        Returns true if this factory supports skins with the given ID, false otherwise.
        Specified by:
        isSupportingTypeIdentifier in interface SkinFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The ID of the skin for which it should be queried if this factory supports its construction.
        Returns:
        True if this factory supports creating skins with the given ID, false otherwise.

      • createSkin

        public Skin createSkin(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
                throws AddonException
        Description copied from interface: SkinFactory
        Creates a skin for the given type identifier Throws a addon exception if the type identifier is not supported.
        Specified by:
        createSkin in interface SkinFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - Type identifier of the look and feel.
        Returns:
        The constructed addon.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if an error occurred during the construction.

      • getMetadata

        public AddonMetadata getMetadata(java.lang.String typeIdentifier)
                          throws AddonException
        Description copied from interface: SkinFactory
        Returns the metadata (like human readable name) for a given skin.
        Specified by:
        getMetadata in interface SkinFactory
        Parameters:
        typeIdentifier - The type identifier of the skin for which the metadata should be returned.
        Returns:
        The metadata of the given skin.
        Throws:
        AddonException - Thrown if identifier is not supported by the addon.
